name: Tap Faster 1x1
description:
A very simple game for one time, or maybe two :)
- The minimum number of players is 2.
- The maximum number of players is 4.

What you need to do: You need to do more tap to defeat other players.
You set the time yourself how long the round will last.
- Minimum time 5 seconds
- Maximum time 30 seconds

Good game.

P.S.: and don't break your phone :)
